name: Voice quest
description:
My entry for DeepWeel DTX + Global Game Jam - May Day Mental Health Jam.

I present a puzzle game where you can use the microphone to select options.

Your schizoid self comments on events. It can help you.
This is not the perfect presentation of schizophrenia, it's primarily a game.

The gameplay is short, but it's not easy for some people.

You don't need to use buttons in the game, except in the main menu.
Only the Android version is available.

Used asset from Unity asset store: Clean Settings UI
Used AI-generated voices: texttospeech.io
Used library: https://github.com/EricBatlle/UnityAndroidSpeechRecognizer

 Used sounds:https://www.freesfx.co.uk
(electrical sparking / glovebox open / terrified male scream)
